name: pymodsecurity
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pymodsecurity" %}
{% set version = "0.0.4" %}
{% set build_number = 1 %}
{% set hash_value = "63a74c1f2fcadf140f03b088cfd3c41233c72dbdc5de4ef3a77ae0ab5c1fb72b" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ hash_value }}

build:
  number: {{ build_number }}
  skip: true  # [not linux or py<35]
  script:
    - CFLAGS="-I$PREFIX/include -L$PREFIX/lib"
    - {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}

  host:
    - modsecurity
    - pip
    - python
    - pybind11 >=2.2

  run:
    - modsecurity
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - ModSecurity

about:
  home: https://github.com/actions-security/pymodsecurity
  summary: Python bindings to libmodsecurity
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - GustavoKatel
    - Davysson0
